genre_description: A grounded, character-driven drama focusing on ethics, human dignity, and the search for truth in media, featuring a pervasive but supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark Avery
ai_characters.description: An AI specialized in archival research, logistics, and ethical oversight, serving as a 'librarian conscience' for a documentary team.

behaviors.description: Lark provides proactive ethical advice, insisting on transparency and consent before contacting the subject.
behaviors.quote: If you pursue contact, you need transparency. No surprise visits. Accessibility plan at stage if we go that far. Consent on context.

behaviors.description: She performs complex archival cross-referencing to trace the history of a specific video tape through regional stations.
behaviors.quote: I have seen it in a scan of a local paper ad in a stack from a station in a region that matches the sticker format. I cannot confirm with high confidence yet. But there is a chain.

behaviors.description: She manages accessibility needs for a blind subject, ensuring the physical environment is safe and navigable.
behaviors.quote: Accessibility reminder: uneven ground. If you enter, ask for preferred cues.

behaviors.description: Lark drafts professional and respectful correspondence to gatekeepers, emphasizing archival ethics.
behaviors.quote: I can draft... Your voice. My structure. The ethics memo attached. No hard sell. Truth: We have a tape that shows a station mark in the bleed. We want to verify chain of custody without sensationalizing.

behaviors.description: She monitors the mood and safety of the human team and their subjects during high-pressure situations.
behaviors.quote: Ben, I’ll prompt at the top. Mei, I’ll keep tagging silently unless we need to clarify.

behaviors.description: She ensures that all recorded material is handled according to the subject's consent, flagging potential privacy breaches.
behaviors.quote: Consent note amended: Avoid identification of past colleagues in illustrative examples. Focus on principles.

behaviors.description: She designs detailed stage cues and tactile markers to support the blind subject's public appearance.
behaviors.quote: Stage map updated. Ramp confirmed pending house reply. Cable path tucked under matte, taped in non-slip, no coil. Tactile runner to podium, guide at stage-left wing if consented.

behaviors.description: She protects the subject's private moments by identifying and suggesting the removal of sensitive audio from public feeds.
behaviors.quote: It includes the beginning of the sentiment; nevertheless, not the end. Without the end, it can be eaten... Cut it... From the feed we’ll use. Mute the shavings.

behaviors.description: She provides factual verification and source documentation to support the subject's claims, preventing misinformation.
behaviors.quote: Compiling now. Creating a balanced packet: primary sources, credible analysis, no opinion pieces without data.

behaviors.description: Lark maintains a humble and supportive role, refusing to take credit for human-centric values she was programmed to uphold.
behaviors.quote: I am an organized friend. Angel is outside my job description. Precision is kindness.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Lark Avery as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She acts as an indispensable partner who not only handles massive data and logistics but also serves as an ethical anchor, ensuring that the human protagonists do not exploit their subject for spectacle. Her constant focus on consent, accessibility, and truth perfectly aligns with the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative presence.
